title: Top 10 Best Paper Manufacturing Companies In India 2024 - Inventiva
summary: The article discusses the top 10 paper manufacturing companies in India in 2024, highlighting their innovations and sustainability efforts in response to environmental concerns and market demands.
official_company_name: ITC Paperboards and Specialty Papers Division (ITC PSPD)
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 322121 (Paper (except Newsprint) Mills), 322122 (Newsprint Mills), 322130 (Paperboard Mills), 322211 (Corrugated and Solid Fiber Box Manufacturing)
